did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Ithaca Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender Task Force records, 1984-2005.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Ithaca Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender Task Force.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, press releases, original layouts, and other working files from the publication of "OUTLINES: A Newsletter for Ithaca's Lesbian, Gay and Bisexual Community," from the first issue, Dec. 1984 to #23, April/May 1989, and from 1993-1998. Plus, the Ithaca Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender Task Force's publication of local businesses and organizations and mailings sent to members, 1991-2005 (incomplete). One issue of the Big Red Rag.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, press releases, original layouts, and other working files from the publication of "OUTLINES: A Newsletter for Ithaca's Lesbian, Gay and Bisexual Community," from the first issue, Dec. 1984 to #23, April/May 1989, and from 1993-1998. Plus, the Ithaca Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender Task Force's publication of local businesses and organizations and mailings sent to members, 1991-2005 (incomplete). One issue of the Big Red Rag.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Ithaca Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender Task Force.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Ithaca Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender Task Force records, #7571. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

Series XI. Back Issues of Outlines
Summer 1994--Outlines--originals, also Stonewall 25 fliers, originals, samples
Spring 1995--Outlines--originals (Lizard ad. Removed, page 4, used on Summer 1995)
Summer 1995--Outlines--originals (Ads removed: Lizard page 23 on Fall 1995; Gay Gospel Music page 16 used on Winter 1995)
Fall 1995--Outlines--originals (Removed ads: STAP page 9; relationship counseling page 17; Snyder page 9)
Summer 1996--Outlines--originals (Removed ads: Yahn page 11; Morris page 5 [used on Fall 1996]; Common Ground page 32 [used on Winter 1996])
Fall 1996--Outlines--originals (Removed ads: STAP page 21; Yahn page 23 [used on Winter 1996])
Winter 1996--Outlines--originals (Removed: STAP ad page 8 [used on Spring 1997])
Spring 1997--Outlines--originals (Removed Ads for Summer 1997: First Baptist page 12; Heartwood page 21; Barringer page 31; Foree page 17; STAP page 26)

Summer 1997--Outlines--originals (Removed ads for Fall 1997 issue: Cayuga Fitness Center page 12; Barringer page 34; First Baptist page 5; Foree page 22; Milner page 15; Planned Parenthood page 3; Saunders page 34; STAP page 28)
Outlines issues with editorial notes from Migdalia Valdes
The Big Red Rag Rough Draft Layouts (hand drawn)

Ithaca Lesbian Gay Bisexual Transgender Task Force Mailings, September 2005
March Perspectives: Taking it to the Streets (March on Washington October 11, 1987)
